name: bj-rrvecsscmn

body.origin:
|- wss(crrvec, ccmn)
-| wss(crrvec, cabl)
-| wss(cabl, ccmn)
body.pretty:
⊢ RRVec ⊆ CMnd
⊣ RRVec ⊆ Abel
⊣ Abel ⊆ CMnd

|- wss(crrvec, ccmn)
-| wss(crrvec, cabl)
-| wss(cabl, ccmn)

⊣ Abel ⊆ CMnd

body.origin:

-| wss(crrvec, clmod)
-| wss(clmod, cabl)

⊢ RRVec ⊆ Abel
⊣ RRVec ⊆ LMod
⊣ LMod ⊆ Abel

body.origin:

-| wss(clvec, clmod)

⊢ RRVec ⊆ LMod
⊣ RRVec ⊆ LVec
⊣ LVec ⊆ LMod

comment: (The additive groups of) real vector spaces are commutative monoids. (Contributed by BJ, 9-Jun-2019.)
